betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oServos, filters, and retrievers are what allows to move items using itemducts and fluiducts!

All have whitelist/blacklist to only move specific items, and they have different redstone modes. 

Right click the connection between a conduit and an inventory to place these items.
Use a crescent hammer to remove them from ducts!

Servos are used to extract from an inventory and push into other inventories.

Filters are used to select or prevent specific items from entering an inventory.

Retrievers are used to pull items from other inventories.
